A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
"Wahhh it didn't go the way I wanted and a girl was the star"-All the 1 star reviews.
This movie was brilliantly directed.  Most of the issues people have are because they built up all these theories in their head for no reason\, then the movie didn't line up.  
If you want a male-centered star wars\, and that is your priority\, that exists.
If you want a nostalgic star wars\, that exists.
If you want predictable star wars\, that exists.
If you want boring backstory star wars\, that exists.
If you want something new\, entertaining\, and intelligent\, this is the star wars movie for you.

This movie was awesome\, the only issue was a couple plot points left hanging\, but this is the 2nd movie of a sequel...so what do you expect?

Go see it.
